author: Aarian Marshall
title: You May Be Able to Own a Self-Driving Car After All
description: For years, automakers focused on using autonomous technology for “robotaxis,” akin to a shared Uber. A GM announcement this week shows that’s changing.

author: Mitchell Clark
title: Super Pumped gets a new, longer teaser with more Uber shenanigans
description: There’s a new teaser trailer for Showtime’s Super Pumped: The Battle for Uber, the first season of which will cover the ride-sharing company and its former CEO Travis Kalanick, played by Joseph Gordon-Levitt.

author: Bryan Menegus
title: Lyft is spending millions to stop its Massachusetts drivers from becoming employees
description: Lyft has already splashed out $14.4 million towards a likely November ballot measure in Massachusetts which would cement its drivers as contractors, rather than employees — and the vast majority of those funds were paid in a single, $13 million donation, the …

author: Zacks Equity Research
title: Uber Technologies (UBER) Stock Moves -0.39%: What You Should Know
description: Uber Technologies (UBER) closed at $42.87 in the latest trading session, marking a -0.39% move from the prior day.

author: Mack DeGeurin
title: Taxi Medallion Loan Shark Duped Investors by Planting 'Illegal' Positive News Stories, SEC Says

title: Instacart, Uber's Cornershop settle dispute over data scraping - Reuters
description: Grocery-delivery service Instacart and its Uber-owned rival Cornershop have settled claims that Cornershop unlawfully scraped data and misused images from Instacart's platform, according to a Thursday filing in California federal court.

author: johostetler@gmail.com (Joseph Hostetler)
title: Amex Platinum Uber credits are useful for more than just rides and food delivery — I've been redeeming mine to get free diapers
description: Thanks to my Amex Platinum cards and Uber Eats, I'll receive $1,500+ in Pampers over the next few years — but you can order lots of other items, too.

title: Cabify risks losing fleet supremacy to Uber in home base Madrid - Reuters
description: The ride-hailing app Cabify, one of Spain's few 'unicorn' tech startups, risks losing ground to foreign rivals such as Uber (UBER.N) or Bolt in its home base Madrid due to a row over exclu…

title: Uber rival Bolt raises $711 mln at valuation of over $8 bln - Reuters
description: Estonian startup Bolt said on Tuesday it had raised 628 million euros ($711.40 million) from investors led by Sequoia Capital and Fidelity Management and Research Co, taking its valuation to 7.4 billion euros ($8.38 billion).

author: Lydia Belanger
title: How Uber and Lyft Get Drivers on the Road on Busy Nights Like New Year's
description: Because they can't assign shifts to workers, ride-hailing companies use a variety of incentives to lure out their contract workers.

title: India's Delhi government proposes making 25% of new cab registrations electric - Reuters
description: The Delhi city state government has proposed mandating a quarter of new cab registrations to be electric vehicles, according to a draft note by its transport department.

author: sdolan@businessinsider.com (Shelagh Dolan)
title: Crowdsourced delivery explained: making same day shipping cheaper through local couriers
description: Does the Uber crowdsourcing model work for package deliveries? As ecommerce shopping grows, etailers are fighting to figure out a way to offer same day shipping at low prices. Business Insider explain what crowdsourced delivery is, why its growing and the fut…

author: Hemant Taneja
title: The Era of Blitzscaling Is Over. As a VC, My Money Is On 'Responsible Growth.'
description: Hypergrowth damages companies, people, and the planet. The businesses I'm betting on now are "earning the right to be around for decades."

author: Tristan Cross
title: You know modern life is hard when even adverts don’t try to persuade you otherwise | Tristan Cross
description: People are tired and overworked, and retirement may never come. Do companies like Uber Eats have to remind us of this?A potent memory from one of the more unedifying periods of my life: regularly working late enough to find myself too exhausted or disinclined…

author: Vanessa Barbara
title: I Took Ketamine for My Depression. Things Got Pretty Weird.
description: I became an elephant, an octopus, a balloon. I grew giant hands. But I couldn’t shake my sadness.

author: Michael Wilson, Chelsia Rose Marcius and Nate Schweber
title: A Grim January Leaves Some New Yorkers Fearful for the City’s Future
description: New York is far safer and stronger than in the ’70s. But after a flood of sad news, many people are struggling to find grounds for optimism.

title: Supreme Court Refuses to Require Prompt Action on Texas Abortion Law
description: In dissent, the three liberal justices said the majority, by allowing a time-consuming legal detour, had created “a disaster for the rule of law.”

title: Tesla driver charged with vehicular manslaughter over fatal Autopilot crash

author: Parker Ortolani
title: Uber parks its Apple Watch app in the ever-growing junk yard
description: We can officially add Uber to the long list of major brands that have abandoned their Apple Watch apps. The ride-sharing company has quietly discontinued its watchOS app, displaying a brief message to users who try to launch it. Uber joins Twitter, Instagram,…
